oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Dia!kwain (David Hoesar) (V)
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Brief mention is made of a kind of blue mist, which resembles fire-smoke, and is illness. In the Katkop dialect, by Dia!kwain (L V.-20. 5557-5561). An account of the mist (!kh'o), or haze, which makes the sun feel hot. 1) See also p.5554v for a note on the !kho, which is like a blue mist, 3) See also The !ho and Ko-boken, 3) pp.5559v & 5560v: see The !ho, 4) This story is found in Book V-20.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Lucy Lloyd |xam notebooks
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: The !kh'o: a blue mist which resembles smoke
